alert.note: Alert for Lower Lafourche; St. Charles; Upper Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN ST. CHARLES AND EAST CENTRAL LAFOURCHE PARISHES THROUGH 300 PM CDT... At 228 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Barataria, or 9 miles northeast of Larose, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 35 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Larose, Cut Off, Galliano, and Lockport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized ponding of water in low lying and poor drainage areas. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lower Lafourche; St. Charles; Upper Lafourche
